roleset.name: (cause to) be more coarse
roleset.note: COARSEN-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from coarsen.01-v)

role.descr: instrument or manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: All arguments, slippery new shoes
example.text: Mary coarsened the bottoms of her new high heels with her pet rock.
example.arg: the bottoms of her new high heels

roleset.name: be rough, consist of large constituents

role.descr: specific aspect of ARG1 that is coarse

example.name: coarse-j
example.text: Coarse rhonchi at bilateral bases but no crackles.
